data.title: Amateur Sports Teams, Leagues, Associations Insurance
data.meta_description: We offer liability insurance for youth and adult amateur sports teams, leagues and associations. Optional coverages available – learn more today!
data.text:
K&K’s online application process makes it easy to quote and buy amateur sports team, league and association insurance and receive evidence of coverage immediately. This program is not available in Alaska and Rhode Island.

For eligible sports and age groups reported to K&K, covered operations consist of scheduled, sanctioned, and supervised practices, try-outs, clinics, games, playoffs, and tournaments in which an insured participates or hosts. When reported to K&K, coverage is also offered for registrations, meetings, concession stand operations, participation in parades, picnics, award banquets and ceremonies, and incidental fund-raising activities such as car washes, bake sales, and coin drops.

Sports organizations not eligible for this program or with more complex insurance requirements should visit our Large Amateur Teams, Leagues, and Associations page or our Professional Sports Teams and Leagues page.

If you are affiliated with one of the following organizations, we have a program designed specifically for you! Please call our Sports Division at 800-441-3994 for information on how to apply.
